Explained: What you need to know about arsenic and drinking water https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/explained-what-you-need-to-know-about-arsenic-and-drinking-water/IICXZS7UOJEYTJPXQYPWABFJKE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/explained-what-you-need-to-know-about-arsenic-and-drinking-water/IICXZS7UOJEYTJPXQYPWABFJKE/ Jamie MortonDrinking water testing has turned up slightly higher arsenic levels. Here's what to know. Thu, 28 Nov 2024 18:51:48 +0000 Elevated levels of the toxic heavy metal arsenic have been detected in treated water sourced from the Waikato River - but the river is known to have fluctuations of the naturally-occurring chemical, mainly stemming from geothermal activity. Photo / Mike Scott.
